content: princess leia - amigurumi crochet pattern by roxanne wood this pattern is recommended for the beginning to intermediate crocheter with knowledge of color changing increasing and decreasing also basic sewing and embroidery skills are helpful the leia is made in separate pieces which include body head arms hair assembly hood blaster rifle and belt with eyes and mouth embroidered on later supplies -one crochet hook us size g -dk to worsted weight yarn in the following colors white or off-white body tan head arms brown of choice hair black blaster rifle and small amounts of black and red for face grey/silver belt -stitch marker -yarn needle -poly stuffing abbreviations chain-chain st-stitch slip_stitch- slip_stitch single_crochet-single_crochet single_crochet decrease-single decrease worked over two stitches repeat -repeat the leia measures about 5 tall each piece will begin in the same manner with a chain 2 followed by 5 single_crochet in the first chain each piece should be finished by making a slip_stitch into the next st to ensure a smooth finish we will begin with the body in the center of the bottom with white or off-white chain 2 round 1 in the first st
